text: Hello :slightly_smiling_face: I'm trying to set up my local cli to include a second project/account, but can't seem to succeed. When I run hs auth, I only get forwarded to my current account. Is there any way of modifying your config-file for more portals, or how do I go about this? Super-thankful for all answers :sunny: Thanks!
Hi, make sure you're logged in with the other account
I am.. I have 2 accounts on my profile, but it forwards me to one of them when trying to config the second one
what url do you get forwarded to?
